Rewards Rate: You get 2 reward points on every Rs 100 spent on online purchases and 1 reward point on every Rs. 100 spent on offline purchases.
Reward Redemption: Reward points can be redeemed at rblrewards for exciting rewards and offer on your air travels, hotel bookings, and much more. 1 RP = Re. 0.25.

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: A spend-based waiver on the monthly fee of Rs. 50 on annual spending of Rs. 3,000 or more.
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on transactions between Rs. 500 to Rs. 4,000
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% on withdrawal amount subject to a minimum charge of Rs. 300

product_details: 2 reward points on every Rs 100. spent on online purchases.
1 reward point on every Rs. 100 spent on offline purchases
10% cashback on groceries every month after achieving a spend of Rs. 3,000 in a month.
10% cashback on BookMyShow, Bill payments, and Swiggy on spending Rs. 5,000 or more in a month.
Spend-based waiver of monthly membership fee.
